In other news I got myself a N900 \o/ I can now handle email while stuck on the bus, yay. I would have posted a picture, but I applied the protector film so poorly that I can't take a picture without weird reflections. Ah well. Here's a picture from Nokia themselves, who are much better photographers than I am :-)

entry.title: New addition to the family | Roomba!
entry.summary: The name was supposed to be Yojimbo (as a very useful but usually quite expensive invocation), but after observing the robot in action it will probably become Bumpy. The cat is not quite sure what to make out of the jumpy, noisy intruder yet, and is observing keenly and safely …
entry.content: The name was supposed to be Yojimbo (as a very useful but usually quite expensive invocation), but after observing the robot in action it will probably become Bumpy. The cat is not quite sure what to make out of the jumpy, noisy intruder yet, and is observing keenly and safely from her perch up the stairs.
